IMaterial Interface Reference
[MAT+ Module]

import "matplus.idl";

Inheritance diagram for IMaterial:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

MAT+ Generic Material.

This class models a textured or untextured material. If colours are not set, white is taken as default.

Definition at line 102 of file matplus.idl.
